replies.body:
Hi Rattle!

I suggest by trying to go to this website (it is a mod though :( ): http://www.minecraftcapes.co.uk/
 
I hope this helps! :D
replies.body_tagged:
Hi Rattle!

replies.body: At optifine.com you can donate $10 and in return you get a cape. Or, you can get an official minecraft cape that ALL users can see by going to MineCon, or getting the cape code from somebody else.
replies.body_tagged: At optifine.com you can donate $10 and in return you get a cape. Or, you can get an official minecraft cape that ALL users can see by going to MineCon, or getting the cape code from somebody else.

replies.body: That's a bunch of scams tbh I have a cape so I should know
replies.body_tagged: That's a bunch of scams tbh I have a cape so I should know

replies.body: Well...scam or no scam, it kinda works. I tried it on SinglePlayer world and it is ok. But because it is a mod, you have to install Forge. But I believe he is asking so that he can use it for Multiplayer. It is only a suggestion.

replies.body: An advice you should consider is not trying to get "free Minecon or Optifine capes for free" in websites that ask you for your email and password of your account, those sites are not secure and you can get scammed.
replies.body_tagged: An advice you should consider is not trying to get "free Minecon or Optifine capes for free" in websites that ask you for your email and password of your account, those sites are not secure and you can get scammed.
